name: Sleeping
translation: O Allah, by Your name I live and die.

name: Awakening
duah: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
transliteration: Alhamdulillah hillazi, Ahyana Ba'dam Amatana, Wa Ilahin Nushur
translation: All praise be to Allah, who gave us life after killing us (sleep is a form of death) and to Him will we be raised and returned

name: Dua for illness
transliteration: Allahumma inni aouthubika min albaras wal junun wal judam wa min sayeeil asqaam
translation: O Allah I seek your refuge from leprosy,insanity,mutilation and from all serious illnesses

name: Toilet Dua
duah: اللَّهُـمَّ إِنِّي أَعُـوذُ بِـكَ مِـنَ الْخُـبْثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ.
transliteration: allahumma innee aAAoothu bika minal-khubthi wal-khaba-ith
translation: O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers.

name: Dua for Anger
translation: Oh Allah, remove anger from my heart.

name: Dua for Negativity
translation: Oh Allah wash away my negativity.
